file_content.text: What is it, Mako? I just touched down.
I've been combing through the Imperial's network since we docked.
After cross-referencing their records with data on the HoloNet, I hit pay dirt.
Surprise, surprise. There are a lot of people locked up on Belsavis with outstanding bounties.
I'll keep an eye out for targets of opportunity.
Noted.
Great work.
Just doing my job.
Can't have that, can we?
Time to clean house.
I thought you might feel that way.
Most aren't worth much, so I narrowed it down to the best payout: a gang of bandits who heisted a major shipment from the Exchange.
This one's all or nothing, so here's the complete list. Oh, and don't worry about dragging them back; these creeps are wanted dead.
What is it, Torian? I just landed.
Been talking to Horn. He's eager to make a good impression.
Got him to give up intel taken from the Republic's operation. Made some connections.
Lot of the convicts have unclaimed bounties, put together a list.
Could be a decent bonus, but Zale takes priority.
We'll hit them if we can.
Great work.
Thought you'd want to know.
This is gonna be a bantha shoot.
Time to pile up the credits.
No fun in that.
Nixed the small-time. Leaves a hit list from the Exchange. Some gang, pulled a major heist. Bounty's for the lot.
Last thing: Save your carbonite. Nobody's wanted alive.
Forget something, Horn?
More an afterthought. Our cache of data from the prison included records of the incarcerated.
After cross-referencing the HoloNet I was able to put together a list of inmates with outstanding bounties, if you're interested.
I'll keep an eye out, provided it doesn't jeopardize my primary target.
Convenient.
I'm sure you'll choose the appropriate course of action.
You're a useful guy to have around.
Thanks for the head's up.
I try to be thorough.
I'm always interested.
Nothing jaw-dropping, but the sum total should appeal to you.
The Exchange has a bounty out on a gang of thieves responsible for stealing one of their major shipments.
These targets are all wanted dead, no questions asked. Best of luck.
